title: All the modification proposals from Regional Plan already sanctioned by the State Government under section 20(4) of Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966 but not shown in respective zone in Regional Plan shall be treated as included in respective Zone as per the modification sanctioned by the State Government
clause_text: All the modification proposals from Regional Plan already sanctioned by the State Government under section 20(4) of Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966 but not shown in respective zone in Regional Plan shall be treated as included in respective Zone as per the modification sanctioned by the State Government.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
